content: yo insert hook in the stitch and pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through loop and slip knot so on for every stitch invisible join when you ve made your last stitch cut the yarn leaving enough to darn in pull the yarn through the stitch and darn to a needle now you want to make a false stitch above the first stitch you made do this by putting the needle under both loops from the second stitch and then put it back through the middle of the v from the last stitch you made this way you create another v dc2 3 decrease make a double_crochet but don t pull through the last 2 loops do this 1 2 times more you should have 3 4 loops on your hook yo and pull through all 3 4 loops fp and bp stitches these are normal stitches but worked around a stitch from the previous round so for instance a bpdc is a normal double_crochet worked around a stitch - fp insert your hook around a stitch from the front of your work to the back and to the front again so the stitch you will be crocheting around will be sitting in front of your hook - bp here insert your hook from the back to the front and to the back again the stitch you will be crocheting around will be sitting at the back of your hook puff yo insert hook in stitch and pull up a loop do this 4 times you should have 9 loops on your hook yo and pull through all 9 loops chain 1 this chain is part of the stitch and does not count as a stitch on its own pattern round 1 color a start with a magic_ring decrease chain 2 x 8 in magic_ring fo with inv join 8 decrease 8 ch2-sps round 2 color b start in any ch2-space decrease chain 1 decrease in every ch2-space fo with inv join 16 decrease 8 ch1-sps round 3 color c start in any ch1-space * 1 half_double_crochet 3dc 2 treble_crochet in next ch1-space 1 fpdtr round decrease from round 1 2 treble_crochet 3 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in next ch1-space 1 fpdc round the next decrease from round 1* repeat 3 more times fo with inv join 2 half_double_crochet 6 double_crochet 4 treble_crochet 1 fpdtr 1 fpdc per side round 4 color b in this round we ll be working in the spaces between 2 decrease from round 2 start in any space behind a fpdc * 1 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 3 treble_crochet 2 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in space 1 single_crochet in the next space i e behind the fpdtr * repeat 3 more times fo with inv join 2 half_double_crochet 4 double_crochet 3 treble_crochet 1 single_crochet per side round 5 color a in this round we ll be working in both round 3 and 4 start in any fpdtr from round 3 *1 puff in
